mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NUMBER ASC) RNUM, C.* FROM CUSTOMER_BOARD C ORDER BY BOARD_NUMBER ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{pageNum} AND #{contentNum}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NUMBER ASC) RNUM, R.* FROM REVIEW_BOARD R ORDER BY BOARD_NUMBER ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{pageNum} AND #{contentNum}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NUMBER ASC) RNUM, R.* FROM RIDER_BOARD R ORDER BY BOARD_NUMBER ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{pageNum} AND #{contentNum}

SELECT BOARD_NUMBER, TITLE, MENU_ID, WRITER, BOARD_LOCAL, CONT, TO_CHAR(INDATE + 9/24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS INDATE, BOARD_CHECK
FROM CUSTOMER_BOARD
WHERE MENU_ID = #{menu_id}
ORDER BY BOARD_NUMBER DESC

SELECT BOARD_NUMBER, TITLE, MENU_ID, WRITER, RIDER_LOCAL, CONT, TO_CHAR(INDATE + 9/24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS INDATE, BOARD_CHECK
FROM RIDER_BOARD
WHERE MENU_ID = #{menu_id}
ORDER BY BOARD_NUMBER DESC
